transform: <xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fn="http://www.w3.org/2005/02/xpath-functions"><xsl:output method="text" indent="yes" encoding="utf-8"/><xsl:template match="/">{ <xsl:if test="/node()/total-item-count"> "count": <xsl:value-of select="/node()/total-item-count"/>, </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/node()/error"> "error" : { <xsl:for-each select="/node()/error"> "message": "<xsl:value-of select="./message"/>", "statusCode": "<xsl:value-of select="./status-code"/>" </xsl:for-each> }, </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/node()/result-sections/result-section/search-results/search-result"> "documents" : [ <xsl:for-each select="/node()/result-sections/result-section/search-results/search-result"> {"title": "<xsl:value-of select="translate(./document-title, '\"', '')"/>", "webURL" : "<xsl:for-each select="./document-url-list/document-url[@name='Document Link']"><xsl:value-of select="./@url"/></xsl:for-each>", "type": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-content-type"/>", "creationDate": " <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='added-date']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()"/></xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='date']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()"/></xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='last-updated']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()"/></xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='last-updated-date']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()"/></xsl:for-each> ", "snippets": [ <xsl:for-each select="./snippets/snippet"> "<xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')"/>" <xsl:if test="position() != last()">,</xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> ], "additionalProperties": { "document-guid": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-guid"/>" } } <xsl:if test="position() != last()">,</xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> ] </xsl:if> }</xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
